text: Burlok Damminsson is a Master Engineer and current leader of the legendary Engineers Guild.
The Grandmaster of the Guild is the most talented of all engineers.
A unique cocktail of ingredients provide the biggest of all bangs.
A true visoniar dares to take risks in the most experimental of designs.
His legendary telescope sees further than most astromancers ever will.
Deep in foreign lands the Guild marches on in search of their next ingenious design.
Experimental weaponry sometimes misses their mark, yet other times proof extremely effective.
The Dwarven engineers are revered and famed for their talented designs and experiments.
Construction time: %+n% for all Engineering chain buildings
Construction cost: %+n% for all Engineering chain buildings
''You know how 't is, some engines need some time to warm up and truly get the clockwork ticking.''

Burlok's Ingenious Offensive New-matic Integrated Constrictor Arm (B.I.O.N.I.C.) was constructed by Burlok himself to replace his lost arm and is extremely strong, making him a powerful force on the battlefield.
Burlok wears heavy gromril armour, engraved with the Rune of Stone and the Rune of Iron.

In battle Burlok wields an ornate, elaborate and deadly version of a craftsman's hammer, engraved with the Master Rune of Swiftness. It was obtained on one of Burlok's many expeditions, this one to far reaches of the Northern holds. It is said to hold properties that carry the essence of frost.
